Keywords: Brotherhood of Mutants , Codex , Monster , X-Men
Real Name: Anne Marie LeBeau
Special Powers
SYMBIOTIC FUSION: Plasticity, Super Senses. // If Venom Rogue is within 4 squares and line of fire of an opposing character, she can't be targeted by range attacks.
I CAN REMEMBER EVERYONE I'VE EVER TOUCHED: When Venom Rogue hits, give a hit character an Absorption token. // FREE: Choose a displayed standard power that an adjacent character or a character with an Absorption token can use. Venom Rogue can use that power until you choose again.
ALIEN EARTHQUAKE: Quake. // Steal Energy, but she heals 1 click for each hit opposing character damaged by the attack. // When Venom Rogue attacks, she deals penetrating damage.
Figure Errata
Changed text of "I CAN REMEMBER EVERYONE I'VE EVER TOUCHED"

October 5, 2022
hoojeebo
No, it says "displayed standard power", so it has to be a power showing on their dial, not a power that's part of a trait or special power.
October 5, 2022
thereddee
By standard power, can she copy a power that in include in a special power? For instance, could she copy Outwit of Scarlet witch's WITCH'S SIGHT: Outwit, Probability Control. ?
July 8, 2022
Bobcat2022
Absolute queen of the monsters, here. Copying a displayed standard power is still very good, when they only have to be adjacent once and then she can keep the power all game. If anyone on your starting force is showing Prob, Outwit, Perplex, Shape Change, even Hypersonic? Bam, you've got two of that. She’s probably the best close-combat piece with the Empyre-style Symbiote trait (sorry, Wolverine, but I'll take Flight and a decent reducer), which to my mind makes her the best Venom in the set for attacking. 12 Attack/4 Damage with Exploit Weakness is very solid, and a printed 12 Speed is nice and zippy. The full dial of penetrating super-Steal-Energy Quake and the X-Men TA offer survivability, and the Brotherhood TA can keep her mobile if your rolls are hot. Yes, the Remaker ring is a particularly strong use of five points on her, but just on her own, she's very, very good.
February 11, 2022
Redrover454
3-1 with her. She's an excellent piece who hits like a truck. The Remaker Ring pairs beautifully with her symbiote trait. Having Shape and Super on her whole dial allows her to focus more on picking up offensive powers like Flurry, Hypersonic, or CCE, and then she has poison for when your opponent has no choice but to base her. Never underestimate the usefulness of multiple targets either. Overall, a strong 4.5 star fig. Sculpt is badass, her dial is strong and thematic, and she has a balanced point value. Easily the best Rogue yet.
December 31, 2021
tidge
This would be a respectable Rogue dial without the Symbiotic Fusion trait. With that trait and the "Venom" name, at 75-points she becomes the top sideline candidate to be called in by the 90-point SVAC Venom Dr. Strange. "Venom" figures with flight aren't as rare as they once were, but few are as inexpensive and as tough as this version of Anne Marie. She's got many good reasons to leverage that opening 4-damage close-combat attack, and her dial full of Empower is very valuable for her allies.
December 23, 2021

Welp, this got an errata: it's "standard power" instead of just "power". Back to work, guys.

vamroc

December 22, 2021
FlashSpidey
Would taking a stop power give the safeguard: outwit?
December 16, 2021
nadeking
There is nothing stopping here from copying a STOP power. It will not accomplish what you want it to. It is not on the dial, so the stop clicking the dial part of STOP will not happen, because that requires the power being revealed, and a copied power is not revealed. She would get all effects of a power with STOP except she would never activate the STOP triggered effect as the power will never be revealed.

She can't remain like This, I played a team with 3 Copies of her After having copied stop clix...It Is too hard even kill One of her, consider kill 3 of them...give time to wizkids to sell empyre and in few weeks She will be changed

December 16, 2021
KlaudyD
But she can FREE action steal that stop click. Of she's successful with her steal energy punch she can heal off it and be ready to use it for your enemies turn. And she can repeat this if the player choose. All and all don't put a STOP click infront of rouge.
December 14, 2021
nadeking
STOP requires being revealed in order to stop clicking the dial. If she copies STOP, she would gain the powers provided and the other effects of STOP, but it would not make her click 1 damage at a time.

Goop
She's deals penetrating damage and steal energy her whole dial and can get off some insane heals from either double target or quaking. As a melee she combos especially well with that Symbiotic fusion trait too. One of the nastier venom pieces in the set.
